mapper.select: SELECT a.contract_hash AS contractHash, a.creator AS creator, a.description as description, a.logo as logo, a.create_time as createTime, a.update_time as updateTime, a.contact_info as contactInfo, b.total_supply as totalSupply, b.decimals as decimals, b.`name` AS name, b.symbol as symbol, a.address_count as addressCount, a.ont_sum as ontSum, a.ong_sum as ongSum, a.tx_count as txCount FROM tbl_contract a LEFT JOIN tbl_oep4 b ON a.contract_hash = b.contract_hash WHERE a.type = 'oep4' order by a.create_time desc
